## Protocol.Debugger.ResumeRequest interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ResumeRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [terminateOnResume](./puppeteer.protocol.debugger.resumerequest.terminateonresume.md) | boolean | Set to true to terminate execution upon resuming execution. In contrast to Runtime.terminateExecution, this will allows to execute further JavaScript (i.e. via evaluation) until execution of the paused code is actually resumed, at which point termination is triggered. If execution is currently not paused, this parameter has no effect. |
